column4: i'm having an issue expaning my ext3 filesystem.. it's the one ubuntu is on. even if i goot with the gparted liveCD it won't let me extend it.. there's unallocated space right beside it.. can't format another partition, i already have 4.. doesn't allow me to make extended file system either
are you running gparted with gksudo?
make sure you run it with gksudo from a terminal
